parameters: This entrance is closed to protect the town.
Besides, it's too dangerous to enter the
tunnels unarmed.
You found the entrance to the caves. Be sure you
have your weapon ready.
This plague is killing us. So many are sick. We need
help.
How can I help?
I don't imagine I'd be much use to you.
How can I help?
You aren't sick, are you? Good. Then go find the
source of this sickness. We believe it's in the
caverns below the city. You can find the entrance
at the western edge of town.
We closed it to protect the town, but we'll open it
for you. We will close it up behind you but we'll
leave a guard. If you find and destroy the source of
disease, he will open it for you again.
Wait. You can't go unarmed. We've got a special
weapon that will help you. We're all cowards and
nobody was willing to take the risk. Thank you for
volunteering.
I gave you a special weapon. Don't forget to equip it.
It's not going to do you much good sitting in your
backpack.
I don't imagine I'd be much use to you.
Who else is going to help us?
I just came for apples. But I guess I have to do it.
I just came for apples. But I guess I have to do it.
Thank you. You'll get all the Apples you need if you
destroy the source of this sickness. We believe it's
in the caverns below the city. You can find the
entrance at the western edge of town.
Wait. You can't go unarmed. We've got a special
weapon that will help you. We're all cowards and
nobody was willing to take the risk. Thank you for
volunteering.
I gave you a special weapon. Don't forget to equip it.
It's not going to do you much good sitting in your
backpack.
You aren't sick, are you? Good. Then go find the
source of this sickness. We believe it's in the
caverns below the city. You can find the entrance
at the western edge of town.
We closed it to protect the town, but we'll open it
for you. We will close it up behind you but we'll
leave a guard. If you find and destroy the source of
disease, he will open it for you again.
Wait. You can't go unarmed. We've got a special
weapon that will help you. We're all cowards and
nobody was willing to take the risk. Thank you for
volunteering.
I gave you a special weapon. Don't forget to equip it.
It's not going to do you much good sitting in your
backpack.
Please hurry. People are dying.
You killed the plague carrier, but we still don't have
a cure. Are you any closer to finding one?
Yes. I just need to get to the Hospital in the
Marketplace. I think I can get a cure there.
Please hurry.
You found the cure? You're kidding, right? Nobody
really thought you'd succeed. The betting pool was
really sad. But...
But I did it, didn't I?
Well, if you don't want it...
But I did it, didn't I?
Yes. Yes, you did. It's a miracle. I'm sorry we doubted
you. What can we do to reward you. Let me see.
Here. Pick your reward.
How about $2000?
Maybe your weight in Apples?
A new house. How about that?
How about $2000?
Make it $5000 and you've got a deal.
Make it $3500.
No. I don't want money.
Make it $3500.
Deal.
You got $3500. You're moving up in the world.
No. I don't want money.
Then what do you want?
Maybe your weight in Apples?
I hope you're kidding.
Well. it was worth a try. We have a lot of Apples.
A new house. How about that?
That's tempting. Are you serious?
Yes. We happen to have a recently abandoned house.
I hope you don't mind that the previous owner, Old
Grampy Sachel succumbed to the plague. The cure didn't
arrive in time for Old Grampy.
That's a sad story.
Do you think Old Grampy would mind?
No. I don't suppose so, given that you saved us all.
That's just the kind of saintly old soul he was.
His grand daughter Loli - sweet gal - she'll will
understand. No worries, eh?
Loli?
No, I guess it's only fair.
Loli?
She works in the shop next door to the house. She's
an orphan now. Works hard to maintain the shop
all by herself. She's really a wonderful young lady.
Uh, why don't I go look at the house first. Maybe
meet her. Um. Talk it over like.
Excellent idea. Come back and tell me how it goes.
No, I guess it's only fair.
If you want, you can stop by the shop next door to
the house and talk to her. She's very nice.
Umm. I'll do that. Thanks.
Well, if you don't want it...
Nononono... Don't be hasty. We aren't ungrateful.
Really. We'll make it worth your while.
How about $2000?
Maybe your weight in Apples?
A new house. How about that?
How about $2000?
Make it $5000 and you've got a deal.
$4000 or I walk.
I changed my mind.
$4000 or I walk.
$4000. Or I go find another town who really wants
this miracle cure that I risked life and limb to
obtain for you.
Deal.
You got $4000. You're moving up in the world.
I changed my mind.
I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'll pass on
the m-m-oney.
Maybe your weight in Apples?
I hope you're kidding.
Yes. We happen to have a recently abandoned house.
I hope you don't mind that the previous owner, Old
Grampy Sachel succumbed to the plague. The cure didn't
arrive in time for Old Grampy.
A new house. How about that?
That's tempting. Are you serious?
Yes. We happen to have a recently abandoned house.
I hope you don't mind that the previous owner, Old
Grampy Sachel succumbed to the plague. The cure didn't
arrive in time for Old Grampy.
That's a sad story.
Do you think Old Grampy would mind?
No. He willed to the town. That's just the kind of
saintly old soul he was. His grand daughter will
understand. No worries, eh?
Grand daughter?
No, I guess it's only fair.
Grand daughter?
She works in the shop next door to the house. She's
an orphan now. Works hard to maintain the shop
all by herself. She's really a wonderful young lady.
Uh, why don't I go look at the house first. Maybe
meet her. Um. Talk it over like.
Excellent idea. Come back and tell me how it goes.
No, I guess it's only fair.
If you want, you can stop by the shop next door to
the house and talk to her. She's very nice.
Umm. I'll do that. Thanks.
So let me get this straight. You want both the money
and the house? As your reward. Am I right?
That's correct, Mr. Mayor. However, I don't plan on
keeping the money. I'm going to use it to expand
Loli's shop so she can live there comfortably.
It's only fair, don't you think?
Fair? Yes. I suppose it is.
Your help came at a high price.
Fair? Yes. I suppose it is.
My goal is to do the right thing for Loli, but also
for myself. I've never had such a nice home. And
Loli had encouraged me. She says I can fit in here,
and she doesn't want me to leave.
Since you put it that way, how can I say no. All right,
would the house and $3000 be enough? We do owe  you
a great debt, and perhaps this still isn't enough.
I want this to be all you ever owe me. I never set out
to be any kind of hero. But I accept your generosity
and hope it all turns out well.
The Mayor gives you the deed to the house and $3000.
A
Your help came at a high price.
My help? Is that what you call it? I saved your asses.
Don't tell me you're going to try to bargain with me.
I would expect better.
No. It's just... I guess it all took me by surprise.
We're not rich here in Applegate. But we will accept your proposal..
No. It's just... I guess it all took me by surprise.
(laughs) You aren't any more surprised than I am.
But the way I see it, you still come out ahead. I
mean, you're still breathing, right?
Yes. And we will recover. Perhaps you'll help is
rebuild?
Perhaps. So we have a deal then.
Yes. $3000 and the deed to the house.
Done.
The Mayor gives you the deed to the house and $3000.
A
We're not rich here in Applegate. But we will accept your proposal..
I think yhou're rich enough. Look around you. You
have your lives, beautiful fields, a river. Money
isn't everything... Who am I kidding? I like money
as much as the next guy. Let's do this thing.
The Mayor gives you the deed to the house and $3000.
A
We need to save the trees.
Loli. You organize the bucket brigade. We need everyone
to pitch in while they fix the water main.
You. Hero. I want you to stay with me for a moment.
Mayor: Hero, please wait just a moment.
I need to help Loli.
Why? Did I do something wrong?
I need to help Loli.
Loli and the bucket brigade have trained for fires.
Not for anything like this, to be sure, but they will
do all they can. I need you for something else.
How can I help?
Two things. First, you can help find Slanger and make
sure he's gone.
Why not arrest him?
No. He works for some very powerful people. People
capable of doing this - and worse. Which is the
second thing I want to ask of you.
What is it?
I know you are settling in here in Applegate, and that
you and Loli are becoming close. But I want you to
leave the town and find out who is behind all these
operations. I want you to find a way to protect us.
Why me?
I don't know where to start.
I have an idea who it is.
Why me?
You've shown the resourcefulness I think is necessary,
and you know more about the world outside of here
than any of us. We're a provincial little community.
Few of us have traveled, and those how have are old.
I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold
back from Slanger, you can...
No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm
asking of you. We'll be all right. This isn't the
first time we've been tested.
Don't worry about it. I'll get Slanger.
And he'll pay.
Then you'll help us?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the cavern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
If you agree, you might need some money to accomplish
what I've asked of you.
No. I'll be all right. But I'll try to get your money
back from Slanger before I leave.
Then you agree?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the cavern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
I don't know where to start.
You know more about the world outside of here
than any of us. We're a provincial little community.
Few of us have traveled, and those how have are old.
Perhaps you've seen some things in your travels.
Yes, I suppose I have. There are places that are not
as simple as Applegate. Places where dark and light
seem to coexist. I think I know where I would start.
That's encouraging. So you'll do what I ask?
I want to help, but I also want to protect Loli.
I agree. These people will never leave you alone.
I want to help, but I also want to protect Loli.
Loli is safest here, but not if more Slangers come.
I'm sure we'll catch this one, but who is next, and
how much worse? Does someone have to die next time?
Yes. You're right. If I catch Slanger, maybe I can get
some information from him.
Good idea. I'm entrusting you with a very big task,
but you'll truly be the hero of Applegate if you can
succeed.
I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold
back from Slanger, you can...
No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm
asking of you. We'll be all right. This isn't the
first time we've been tested.
If you agree, you might need some money to accomplish
what I've asked of you.
No. I'll be all right. But I'll try to get your money
back from Slanger before I leave.
Then you agree?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the cavern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
I agree. These people will never leave you alone.
Yes. Someone has to stop them. You may need help
though. Try to find allies. Perhaps others who have
also been the victims of these fiends.
That is sound advice. I've always said that I'm no
hero. But perhaps I can find some real heroes along
the way.
I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold
back from Slanger, you can...
No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm
asking of you. We'll be all right. This isn't the

No. I'll be all right. But I'll try to get your money

Then you agree?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the cavern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
I have an idea who it is.
We can only trust in your knowledge of the world
outside. Few of us have traveled much, and those who
have are too old for such a task.
Well, I know where I'll start, at least. But I have no
idea how I will stop them.
Let us hope that providence will provide, as it did
for us when you appeared. But also perhaps you can
find some allies. People who also want to stop them.
That is sound advice. I've always said that I'm no
hero. But perhaps I can find some real heroes along
the way.
I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold

No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm

No. I'll be all right. But I'll try to get your money

Then you agree?
Yes.

Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
Why? Did I do something wrong?
No.. No. On the contrary, you've done much that is
right. You've earned our trust and gratitude. You've
treated Loli with fairness and friendship.
But I still wonder, why me? Isn't there anyone else?
We can only trust in your knowledge of the world
outside. Few of us have traveled much, and those who
have are too old for such a task.
Well, I know where I'll start, at least. But I have no
idea how I will stop them.
Let us hope that providence will provide, as it did
for us when you appeared. But also perhaps you can
find some allies. People who also want to stop them.
That is sound advice. I've always said that I'm no

I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold

No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm

No. I'll be all right. But I'll try to get your money

Then you agree?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the cavern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever

I will.
A
Go. We're depending on you.
Oh. That smells retched. How can you stand it?
I don't mind it.
Yeah, shoveling shit... not my dream job.
I don't mind it.
Well, I know we might have got off on the wrong foot,
so to speak, but I do admire your dedication. I'm not
a very humble guy, I suppose. You're a good example.
And I can see that Loli likes you.
You were pretty much a dick to me, dude. Now you're
all nice? What gives?
Haha. Yes. Well about that. It was my professional
persona, you might say. Helps me get work, you know.
I wouldn't hire you.
Sure. Sure. I understand. Hey, how about a peace
offering? You've been rubbing your back thi whole time
we've been talking. I've got something that'll make
the pain go away. How about it? Friends?
What's your profession exactly?
That's quite a 180... dude.
Yeah. Now you're talking my language.
What's your profession exactly?
You might say I'm a representative...
I thought you called yourself a "fixer" or something.
(Slanger lips do that smile thing) Yes, well sometimes,
as a representative, I have to do a little fixing.
That's still little vague, man. Can you be a little
more specific?
Well, you see I represent a... a group of investors
you might say, and they are interested in doing
some business here. We have some really quality
goods for sale. Here, I've got some samples here.
No thanks.
Sure, I'll try it.
No thanks.
Suit yourself. But it's all innocent, you see. Once
I've concluded by business, I'll be back on the road
again. So I'm not a threat. Sure you won't try it?
It'll help you with your backache. I know it's hurting.
Nope. Thanks anyway.
So it makes the pain go away?
Nope. Thanks anyway.
ALl right. Well, I guess you should go back to your
shoveling and I'll go see if Loli and I can do some
business. See ya...
Leaves
I need to go warn Loli right now.
A
I need to go warn Loli right now.
A
So it makes the pain go away?
Well yes. Among other things. But maybe you shouldn't
sample it. It's pretty strong. You migt not be able
to handle it.
I doubt it, but no thanks.
What? Give it here!
What is it exactly?
I doubt it, but no thanks.
Hm. You think you can take it?
No. I'm not going to be tempted.
I can handle anything. Hand it over.
No. I'm not going to be tempted.
ALl right. Well, I guess you should go back to your
shoveling and I'll go see if Loli and I can do some
business. See ya...
Leaves
I can handle anything. Hand it over.
Ok. Here you go. Don't say I didn't warn you.
Slanger hands you a pill. It pulsates with energy.
You swallow it and within two seconds you feel light-
headed and then there's a blast of light and you
feel better than you've ever felt. Are you seeing God?
Slanger leans over and whispers in your ear, "Im going
to tell you a secret, but you have to promise not to
tell anyone else," and then you pass out. The world
goes black.
Drugged
A
What? Give it here!
Slanger hands you a pill. It pulsates with energy.

Drugged
What is it exactly?
Secret ingredient.
Very mysterious, but doesn't tell me anything. Let's
try it another way. What does it do?
What doesn't it do?
Now you're being a dick again.
Ok. Ok. It's hard to describe. It is a secret proccess
and it... well the effect varies with who takes it.
For you, I think it will be the most amazing
experience you've ever had. Trust me.
Trust you? Not likely.
Yeah, that's sound great, but... really?
If it's half of what you claim, how can I say no?
It's not poison, is it?
Trust you? Not likely.
Well, suit yourself. I suppose if I was in your shoes
I'd be a little suspicious. But I'm not exaggerating.
I promise you that.
I still don't think so.
You promise? Ok. It does sound amazing.
I still don't think so.
Leaves
You promise? Ok. It does sound amazing.

It's not poison, is it?
Hahaha... Wow. Paranoid much? How in all the holy

It's not that hard.
You're right. I'm an idiot.
It's not that hard.
Well, I don't want you to take anything you don't want.
Good. I pass.
But... I do sort of want it.
Good. I pass.

But... I do sort of want it.
Make up your mind. Yes or no?
Yes
No
Yes

That's quite a 180... dude.
No. Not really. It's an act. That's all. Think of
it as a performance.
Performance? Who are you performing for? What are you
up to?
You might say I'm a representative...
I thought you called yourself a "fixer" or something.
(Slanger lips do that smile thing) Yes, well sometimes,

That's still little vague, man. Can you be a little

Well, you see I represent a... a group of investors
you might say, and they are interested in doing
some business here. We have some really quality
goods for sale. Here, I've got some samples here.
I think I'm getting the picture.
Samples? Of what?
I think I'm getting the picture.
Oh? What picture is that?
Well, from what I can see, you're nothing but a con
artist. What are you really up to, Mr. Slanger?
It's just Slanger...
I don't give a rat's ass. What are you up to?
Ease up, friend. You really need to destress yourself.
You know what would destress me? Slamming you over
the head with this shovel.
Hey. Calm down. Please. I don't mean any harm. Listen,
I garauntee that my product will take all your pain
away and help you feel better.
You take a deep breath and tell him, I don't need
your drugs man. There's no way in hell I would trust
you or your "sample". Got it?
Slanger's face hardens. "Your loss then. Why don't
you go back to shoveling shit then. I'll go finish
my business with your girlfriend.
Leaves
Samples? Of what?
It's a secret formula. Even I don't know what's in it.
But it does miracles for pain and stress. I'm telling
you, it is the best you'll ever feel.
I think I'll pass.
That's quite a promise. OK. Hand it over.
I think I'll pass.
That's ok. I'll just leave you to your shovel and your
shit while I go finish my business with
your girlfriend.
Leaves
That's quite a promise. OK. Hand it over.

Yeah. Now you're talking my language.
Yeah, I had a feeling about you. You're gonna love

Drugged
Yeah, shoveling shit... not my dream job.
I can relate. Backbreaking, smelly work. Why do you
do it?
They've had a hard time here. I'm just trying to help
out while they get back to full health.
You're sweet on Loli, too. Amiright?
That's none of your business.
What of it?
That's none of your business.
Woah. Didn't mean to touch a nerve. I mean, it's ok.
She's a sweet one, she is. No. Back off... I don't
have any designs on her. I'm just buttering her up
a little so I can do some business here.
Business? What kind of business.
Well, you see I represent a... a group of investors
you might say, and they are interested in doing
some business here. We have some really quality
goods for sale. Here, I've got some samples here.
No thanks.
Sure, I'll try it.
No thanks.
Suit yourself. But it's all innocent, you see. Once
I've concluded by business, I'll be back on the road
again. So I'm not a threat. Sure you won't try it?
It'll help you with your backache. I know it's hurting.
Nope. Thanks anyway.
So it makes the pain go away?
Nope. Thanks anyway.
ALl right. Well, I guess you should go back to your
shoveling and I'll go see if Loli and I can do some
business. See ya...
Leaves
So it makes the pain go away?
Pain? That's the least of it. This is a miracle of
science. It takes way pain, anguish, stress, grief...
it makes everything... not just better, but the
best you've ever felt.
That's some sales pitch.
How can I say no to that? Let's do it.
That's some sales pitch.
It's no bull. I've tried ordinary substances, and none
of them hold a candle to this. Try it. You will be
glad you did.
No. I don't trust you. Nice try though.
Ok. You win. Hand it over.

What of it?
Woah. Didn't mean to touch a nerve. I mean, it's ok.
She's a sweet one, she is. No. Back off... I don't
have any designs on her. I'm just buttering her up
a little so I can do some business here.
Business? What kind of business.
Well, you see I represent a... a group of investors
you might say, and they are interested in doing
some business here. We have some really quality
goods for sale. Here, I've got some samples here.
No thanks.
Sure, I'll try it.
No thanks.
Suit yourself. But it's all innocent, you see. Once
I've concluded by business, I'll be back on the road
again. So I'm not a threat. Sure you won't try it?
It'll help you with your backache. I know it's hurting.
Nope. Thanks anyway.
So it makes the pain go away?
Nope. Thanks anyway.
ALl right. Well, I guess you should go back to your
shoveling and I'll go see if Loli and I can do some
business. See ya...
Leaves
So it makes the pain go away?
Pain? That's the least of it. This is a miracle of
science. It takes way pain, anguish, stress, grief...
it makes everything... not just better, but the
best you've ever felt.
That's some sales pitch.
How can I say no to that? Let's do it.
That's some sales pitch.
It's no bull. I've tried ordinary substances, and none
of them hold a candle to this. Try it. You will be
glad you did.
No. I don't trust you. Nice try though.
Ok. You win. Hand it over.

Comment : <Mini Label: LOLI SHOP TEST>
This is the place to shovel the manure.
You filled the wheelbarrow with enough manure for
5 trees.
You still have \v[44] loads to complete.
That was the last load. Go back and let Loli know
that the job is done.
You still have \v[44] loads to complete.
You still haven't emptied the wheelbarrow.
Slanger's gone. Loli and I need to talk to the Mayor.
Oh. Nonono. This can't be.
The apple trees. They're burning.
Loli. Can you help organize the effort to put out the
fires? We need to work fast. Hero, I want you to
stay here. I have something to propose.
We need to save the trees.
Loli. You organize the bucket brigade. We need everyone
to pitch in while they fix the water main.
You. Hero. I want you to stay with me for a moment.
Mayor: Hero, please wait just a moment.
I need to help Loli.
Why? Did I do something wrong?
I need to help Loli.
Loli and the bucket brigade have trained for fires.
Not for anything like this, to be sure, but they will
do all they can. I need you for something else.
How can I help?
Two things. First, you can help find Slanger and make
sure he's gone.
Why not arrest him?
No. He works for some very powerful people. People
capable of doing this - and worse. Which is the
second thing I want to ask of you.
What is it?
I know you are settling in here in Applegate, and that
you and Loli are becoming close. But I want you to
leave the town and find out who is behind all these
operations. I want you to find a way to protect us.
Why me?
I don't know where to start.
I have an idea who it is.
Why me?
You've shown the resourcefulness I think is necessary,
and you know more about the world outside of here
than any of us. We're a provincial little community.
Few of us have traveled, and those how have are old.
I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold
back from Slanger, you can...
No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm
asking of you. We'll be all right. This isn't the
first time we've been tested.
Don't worry about it. I'll get Slanger.
And he'll pay.
Then you'll help us?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the eastern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
If you agree, you might need some money to accomplish
what I've asked of you.
No. I'll be all right. But I'll try to get your money
back from Slanger before I leave.
Then you agree?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the easterb
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
A
I don't know where to start.
You know more about the world outside of here
than any of us. We're a provincial little community.
Few of us have traveled, and those how have are old.
Perhaps you've seen some things in your travels.
Yes, I suppose I have. There are places that are not
as simple as Applegate. Places where dark and light
seem to coexist. I think I know where I would start.
That's encouraging. So you'll do what I ask?
I want to help, but I also want to protect Loli.
I agree. These people will never leave you alone.
I want to help, but I also want to protect Loli.
Loli is safest here, but not if more Slangers come.
I'm sure we'll catch this one, but who is next, and
how much worse? Does someone have to die next time?
Yes. You're right. If I catch Slanger, maybe I can get
some information from him.
Good idea. I'm entrusting you with a very big task,
but you'll truly be the hero of Applegate if you can
succeed.
I still have $\v[3] left. If I can't get the gold
back from Slanger, you can...
No. You might need some money to accomplish what I'm
asking of you. We'll be all right. This isn't the
first time we've been tested.
Don't worry about it. I'll get Slanger.
And he'll pay.
Then you'll help us?
Yes.
After this, Slanger will be running. Check the eastern
exit and see if anyone has seen him.
Good luck. We'll all be counting on you. Do whatever
you you can to ensure our safety.
I will.
